text: Purusera naridera upara krrtatbasila e jan'ya ye, allaha ekera upara an'yera baisistya dana karechena ebam e jan'ya ye, tara tadera artha byaya kare. Se mate nekakara strilokagana haya anugata ebam allaha ya hephayatayogya kare diyechena loka caksura antarale'o tara hephayata kare. Ara yadera madhye abadhyatara asanka kara tadera sadupadesa da'o, tadera sayya tyaga kara ebam prahara kara. Yadi tate tara badhya haye yaya, tabe ara tadera jan'ya an'ya kona patha anusandhana karo na. Niscaya allaha sabara upara srestha.
